Question
========

x is the mean and Y is the standard deviation of a set of measurements that is normally distributed. What then is the percentage greater than x +- 1.5Y of these measurements?

Answerlist
----------

* 23%
* 34%
* 68%
* 93%
* 99%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 23%: Incorrect
* 34%: Incorrect
* 68%: Incorrect
* 93%: Correct
* 99%: Incorrect
